Reviews.Content: Love this new boutique hotel a really good value hotel. new hotel, nice location close to Hibiya Metro and Imperial Plaza is just next door,, size consider to be ok, rooms facilities include: massage chair, LCD TV (unfortunaltely only japan language), Free Internet, modern interior.bathroom only has showers but i think its enough.bfast voucher you can buy for JPY 1000.
Reviews.Author: floe
